'''Mikael Åke Persbrandt''' (born [[25 September]] [[1963]]) is a Swedish actor.

He portrayed [[Beorn]] in ''[[The Hobbit (film series)]]''. The rumour that Persbrandt would have a role in [[Peter Jackson]]'s ''The Hobbit (film series)'' first appeared in Swedish magazine ''[[Wikipedia:Aftonbladet|Aftonbladet]]'' on 3 December 2010.<ref>"[http://www.aftonbladet.se/nojesbladet/film/article8218240.ab Han är klar - för the Hobbit]" at [http://www.aftonbladet.se Aftonbladet.se] (accessed 8 December 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.theonering.net/torwp/2010/12/03/40907-sweedish-actor-mikael-persbrant-cast-in-the-hobbit/ UPDATE: Swedish actor Mikael Persbrandt cast in ‘The Hobbit’?] at TheOneRing.net (accessed 8 December 2010)</ref> On 7 December 2010 it was officially announced that Persbrandt had been cast and that he would portray the character of Beorn.<ref>[http://www.theonering.net/torwp/2010/12/07/41135-torn-exclusive-cate-blanchett-ken-stott-sylvester-mccoy-mikael-persbrandt-join-cast-of-peter-jackson%E2%80%99s-%E2%80%9Cthe-hobbit%E2%80%9D/ TORN EXCLUSIVE: CATE BLANCHETT, KEN STOTT, SYLVESTER MCCOY, MIKAEL PERSBRANDT JOIN CAST OF PETER JACKSON’S “THE HOBBIT”] at TheOneRing.net (accessed 8 December 2010)</ref>

Persbrandt mentioned in an interview that he was a "fantasy geek" as a child, having read all the books by Tolkien.<ref>[http://www.svd.se/kulturnoje/nyheter/persbrandt-i-guillous-hemliga-tjanst_5965241.svd "Persbrandt i Guillous hemliga tjänst" (24 February 2011)] at ''[http://www.svd.se/ Svenska Dagbladet]'' (accessed 26 February 2011)</ref>

==Filmography, selected==
* [[2013]]: ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'': [[Beorn]]
* [[2014]]: ''[[Lego The Hobbit: The Video Game]]'': Beorn (archive footage)
* 2014: [[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug - The Peoples and Denizens of Middle-earth]]: Himself
* 2014: ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'': Beorn
